misuses.misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
misuses.description: The method uses the 'URL' class to print the URL, which is not a cryptographically secure method. It is not recommended to use this method for printing URLs, as it may be vulnerable to certain attacks.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more secure method for printing URLs, such as the 'URI' class.
